meanings.definition: Worked independently for different companies on a temporary basis.
meanings.sent1: She freelanced as a graphic designer for various firms.
meanings.sent2: He freelanced his writing skills to earn extra money.
meanings.sent3: The cat freelanced as a mouse catcher in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent4: Her mind freelanced into a world of creativity while she painted.
meanings.sent5: Freelancing allowed him to explore different industries and gain experience.

meanings.sent1: The freelanced artist showcased her paintings at the local gallery.
meanings.sent2: He admired the freelanced photographer's unique perspective.
meanings.sent3: The freelanced chef surprised everyone with a pop-up restaurant.
meanings.sent4: Her freelanced approach to life brought unexpected opportunities.
meanings.sent5: The freelanced writer's style was versatile and captivating.
